science_skills.name: Mechanical Engineering
science_skills.description: Advanced understanding of mechanical systems. Required for invention of armor, structure, and projectile items. Each level increases research point generation by 50 RP/day.

science_skills.name: Electronic Engineering
science_skills.description: Advanced understanding of electronic systems. Required for invention of electronics, shields, and missiles. Each level increases research point generation by 50 RP/day.

science_skills.name: Rocket Science
science_skills.description: Advanced understanding of propulsion and missile systems. Required for invention of missile launchers and ships. Each level increases research point generation by 50 RP/day.

science_skills.name: Quantum Physics
science_skills.description: Advanced understanding of quantum mechanics. Required for invention of energy weapons and shields. Each level increases research point generation by 50 RP/day.

science_skills.name: Molecular Engineering
science_skills.description: Advanced understanding of molecular structures. Required for invention of hybrid weapons and drones. Each level increases research point generation by 50 RP/day.

science_skills.name: Graviton Physics
science_skills.description: Advanced understanding of gravitational mechanics. Required for invention of propulsion and mining equipment. Each level increases research point generation by 50 RP/day.

science_skills.name: Laser Physics
science_skills.description: Advanced understanding of laser technology. Required for invention of energy weapons. Each level increases research point generation by 50 RP/day.

science_skills.name: Plasma Physics
science_skills.description: Advanced understanding of plasma technology. Required for invention of hybrid weapons. Each level increases research point generation by 50 RP/day.

science_skills.name: Nanite Engineering
science_skills.description: Advanced understanding of nanite technology. Required for invention of armor and repair equipment. Each level increases research point generation by 50 RP/day.

science_skills.name: High Energy Physics
science_skills.description: Advanced understanding of high energy systems. Required for invention of shield and capacitor equipment. Each level increases research point generation by 50 RP/day.

science_skills.name: Amarr Encryption Methods
science_skills.description: Understanding of Amarr data encryption. Required for invention of Amarr Tech II items. Each level increases invention success by 1%.

science_skills.name: Caldari Encryption Methods
science_skills.description: Understanding of Caldari data encryption. Required for invention of Caldari Tech II items. Each level increases invention success by 1%.

science_skills.name: Gallente Encryption Methods
science_skills.description: Understanding of Gallente data encryption. Required for invention of Gallente Tech II items. Each level increases invention success by 1%.

science_skills.name: Minmatar Encryption Methods
science_skills.description: Understanding of Minmatar data encryption. Required for invention of Minmatar Tech II items. Each level increases invention success by 1%.

science_skills.name: Science
science_skills.description: Fundamental scientific knowledge. Prerequisite for all advanced science skills.
